detaileddescription.para: Enable LL tester extensions.
Maximum number of switch patterns.
Packet counter mode (default).
16-bit counter mode, PalCryptoEnc_t::pEventCounter must be non-NULL.
64-bit counter mode, PalCryptoEnc_t::pTxPktCounter/pRxPktCounter must be non-NULL.
ACL.
CIS.
BIS.
Clear IFS (last packet).
Toggle operation with TIFS timing.
Same operation with absolute timing.
Same operation with TIFS timing.
Toggle operation with CS timing.

briefdescription.para: Channel Sounding Step completion call signature.

detaileddescription.para: One-time initialization of BLE baseband driver.
Wake the BB hardware out of sleep and enable for operation. All BB functionality is available when this routine completes. BB clock is set to zero and started.
Disable the baseband and put radio hardware to sleep. Must be called from an idle state. A radio operation cannot be in progress.

pChan
Channelization parameters.
Calling this routine will set parameters for all future transmit and receive operations until this routine is called again providing new parameters.

The setting of channelization parameters influence the operations of the following listed routines. Therefore, this routine is called to set the channel characteristics before the use of data routines described in PAL_BB_BLE_DATA.

simplesect.para: The pParam contents are not guaranteed to be static and is only valid in the context of the call to this routine. Therefore parameters requiring persistence should be copied.

briefdescription.para: Set channelization parameters without applying RF output power.

detaileddescription.para:
pChan
Channelization parameters.
This function is a wrapper for PalBbBleSetChannelParam with the side-effect of not applying RF output power. This is done to meet T_MAFS timing on some platforms, an a no-op on other platforms. This is a workaround for BLE 5.4 qualification tests LL/DDI/SCN/BV-79 and LL/DDI/SCN/BV-80.

briefdescription.para: Set the inline encryption packet count for transmit.

parameterdescription.para: Packet counter value, a 39-bit value (upper bits are ignored).

briefdescription.para: Set the inline decryption packet count for reception.

parameterdescription.para: Packet counter value, a 39-bit value (upper bits are ignored).

briefdescription.para: Set the data packet exchange parameters.

detaileddescription.para:
pParam
Data exchange parameters.
Calling this routine will set parameters for all future transmit and receive operations until this routine is called again providing new parameters.

pOpParam
Operations parameters.
Calling this routine will set parameters for the next transmit or receive operations.

descs
Array of transmit buffer descriptors.
cnt
Number of descriptors.
Set the first data buffer for the first packet of an alternating Tx-Rx data exchange cycle.

briefdescription.para: Transmit packet at TIFS after the last packet received.

detaileddescription.para:
descs
Array of transmit buffer descriptor.
cnt
Number of descriptors.
If possible, the transmit will occur at the TIFS timing. If not possible, the callback status will indicate this.

pBuf
Receive data buffer.
len
Length of data buffer.
Set the first data buffer for the first packet of an alternating Rx-Tx data exchange cycle.

briefdescription.para: Enable set maximum PDU length for packet processor.

detaileddescription.para: Enable set of max PDU length in packet processor. Packet processor stop the reception of data when max length is reached and generated an ISR with PDU len error.

pBuf
Receive data buffer.
len
Length of data buffer.
Set the first data buffer for the first packet of an alternating Rx-Tx data exchange cycle.

briefdescription.para: Receive packet at TIFS after the last packet transmitted.

detaileddescription.para:
pBuf
Receive data buffer.
len
Length of data buffer.
If possible, the receive will occur on the TIFS timing. If not possible, the callback status will indicate this.

briefdescription.para: Transmit packet at TIFS after the last packet received.
Receive CS packet after the last packet transmitted.

detaileddescription.para: This stops any active TIFS timer operation. This routine is always called in the callback (i.e. ISR) context.

briefdescription.para: Cancel a pending transmit or receive.

detaileddescription.para: This stops any active radio operation. This routine is never called in the callback (i.e. ISR) context.

enable
Flag to indicate data whitening.
Sets an internal variable that indicates if data whitening is enabled or not.

enable
Flag to indicate PRBS15.
Immediately enable or disable continuous PRBS15 bitstream. Setting the channelization parameters with PalBbBleSetChannelParam() must precede enabling PRBS15.
Use of PAL_BB_BLE_DATA routines is not allowed while PRBS15 is enabled.

descs
Array of transmit buffer descriptors.
cnt
Number of descriptors.
Set the first data buffer for the first CS packet of an alternating Tx-Rx CS exchange cycle.

pChan
Channelization parameters.
Calling this routine will set parameters for all future transmit and receive operations until this routine is called again providing new parameters.

The setting of channelization parameters influence the operations of the following listed routines. Therefore, this routine is called to set the channel characteristics before the use of data routines described in PAL_BB_BLE_DATA.

simplesect.para: The pParam contents are not guaranteed to be static and is only valid in the context of the call to this routine. Therefore parameters requiring persistence should be copied.

briefdescription.para: Initialize radio resources for Channel Sounding.

detaileddescription.para:
dueTime
Due time.
Radio may sleep until dueTime.
